featured.text: The severity of tropical diseases is also a matter of whether governments are capable—and willing— to defend their populations against infections.
They defend themselves by attacking others.

definition.zh_def: 保護或捍衛某人或某事不受攻擊或傷害。
definition.en_def: To protect or support someone or something from attack or harm.
definition.example: She had to defend her position during the debate.
